incomeVaries.question: What if my income varies from month to month?
incomeVaries.answer: If your income varies, just do your best to estimate what comes in on average. You may want to calculate the average across several months, so you can account for the ups and downs. Or you can pull out last yearâ€™s tax return, and divide your total income by 12.
